subject: Belmont Stakes
Horses
lead_paragraph: War Pass took the lead early and never missed a beat, cruising to a one-and-a-half-length victory in the $400,000 Champagne Stakes at Belmont Park. War Pass, a 2-year-old colt, improved to 3 for 3 for the trainer Nick Zito and is sure to be among the favorites for the $2 million Breeders’ Cup Juvenile on Oct. 27.
